parameters.query: SELECT ou.order_id, ou.platform, ou.total_amount, ou.currency, ou.status, ou.items, ou.shipping_address, ou.created_at, COALESCE(ou.shipping_data->>'tracking_number', '') as tracking_number FROM orders_unified ou WHERE ou.buyer_id = $1 ORDER BY ou.created_at DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT sku, product_name, physical_quantity, listing_quantity FROM inventory_master WHERE sku IN (SELECT jsonb_array_elements_text(items->'skus') FROM orders_unified WHERE buyer_id = $1 LIMIT 5) LIMIT 20

parameters.query: INSERT INTO admin_tasks (task_type, priority, platform, reference_id, reference_type, subject, title, description, draft_reply, draft_content, action_required, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ('inquiry', $1, $2, $3, 'message', $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, true, 'pending', NOW(), NOW()) ON CONFLICT (email_id) DO UPDATE SET draft_reply = EXCLUDED.draft_reply, draft_content = EXCLUDED.draft_content, updated_at = NOW() RETURNING id

parameters.jsCode:
const data = $input.first().json;
return [{ json: { success: true, buyer_id: data.buyer_id, platform: data.platform, inquiry_type: data.ai_result.inquiry_type, urgency: data.ai_result.urgency, detected_language: data.ai_result.detected_language, reply_draft: data.ai_result.reply_draft, processed_at: data.generated_at } }];
